GSD36yajn2piu:114: antare ca tayor yaḥ syāt Yj_2.239c

GSD36yajn2piu:1200: tathātmā eko hy anekaś ca Yj_3.144c
GSD36yajn2piu:1356: te 'ṣṭau likṣā tu tās tisro Yj_1.362c
GSD36yajn2piu:1470: dadyān mātā pitā vā yaṃ Yj_2.130c
GSD36yajn2piu:1523: dāpyas taṃ daṇḍam eva ca Yj_2.35d

GSD36yajn2piu:1531: dāpyo daṇḍaṃ ca yo yasmin Yj_2.222c
GSD36yajn2piu:1572: dṛśyād vā tad vibhāgaḥ syād Yj_2.122c
GSD36yajn2piu:1595: deśaṃ kālaṃ ca bhogaṃ ca Yj_2.181a
GSD36yajn2piu:1638: dviguṇāṃs tu kuśān dattvā hy Yj_1.233a
GSD36yajn2piu:1665: dvau daive prāk trayaḥ pitrya Yj_1.228a
GSD36yajn2piu:1707: dharmyam apy ācaren na tu Yj_1.156d
GSD36yajn2piu:1721: dhīno daṇḍyaś ca sa smṛtaḥ Yj_2.16d
GSD36yajn2piu:1734: na kuryād yo na kārayet Yj_2.158b
GSD36yajn2piu:1735: na kṣayo na ca vṛddhiś ca Yj_2.180c
GSD36yajn2piu:1738: na gor na narajā malāḥ Yj_1.194b
GSD36yajn2piu:1739: nagnaḥ snātvā ca bhuktvā ca Yj_3.290c
GSD36yajn2piu:1741: na ca taiḥ saha saṃvaset Yj_3.15d
GSD36yajn2piu:1742: na ca mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā Yj_1.135c
GSD36yajn2piu:1754: na dadāti hi yaḥ sākṣyaṃ Yj_2.77a
GSD36yajn2piu:1785: na viṣaṃ na tulāṃ tathā Yj_2.99b
GSD36yajn2piu:1788: na śūdro na dvijaḥ kvacit Yj_3.26b
GSD36yajn2piu:1796: na stenaḥ syān na vārdhuṣī Yj_1.132d
GSD36yajn2piu:1894: nītvā hy ubhayam eva vā Yj_1.51d
GSD36yajn2piu:1978: patyā vā saha yat kṛtam Yj_2.49b
GSD36yajn2piu:2001: paraś ca hīna ātmā ca Yj_1.348c
GSD36yajn2piu:2070: pāyo dadhi ca madyaṃ ca Yj_3.40c
GSD36yajn2piu:2076: pālo yeṣāṃ na te mocyā Yj_2.163c
GSD36yajn2piu:2155: pumān apy evam eva hi Yj_2.292d
GSD36yajn2piu:2185: pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ ca na Yj_3.130b
GSD36yajn2piu:2348: phalam asti na veti vā Yj_3.152b
GSD36yajn2piu:2370: bahu deyaṃ ca no 'stv iti Yj_1.246d
GSD36yajn2piu:2451: bhagam indraś ca vāyuś ca Yj_1.282c
GSD36yajn2piu:2493: bhāsaṃ ca hatvā dadyād gām Yj_3.272c
GSD36yajn2piu:2739: medhyā vai yoṣito hy ataḥ Yj_1.71d
GSD36yajn2piu:2817: yad ṛṇaṃ tu kṛtaṃ bhavet Yj_2.45b
GSD36yajn2piu:2823: yady evaṃ sa kathaṃ brahman Yj_3.129a
GSD36yajn2piu:2836: yavo madhyas tu te trayaḥ Yj_1.363b
GSD36yajn2piu:2838: yaś ca taiḥ saha saṃvaset Yj_3.227d
GSD36yajn2piu:2839: yaś ca yasya yadā duḥsthaḥ Yj_1.307a
GSD36yajn2piu:2858: yaṃ yaṃ kratum adhīte ca Yj_1.47c
GSD36yajn2piu:2911: yojyā vyastāḥ samastā vā hy Yj_1.367c
GSD36yajn2piu:2985: ripau mitre ca ye samāḥ Yj_2.2d
GSD36yajn2piu:3053: vayaḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca Yj_1.368c
GSD36yajn2piu:3065: varṇās tv ādyās trayo dvijāḥ Yj_1.10b
GSD36yajn2piu:3074: vasā trayo dvau tu medo Yj_3.106c
GSD36yajn2piu:3322: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca Yj_3.180a
GSD36yajn2piu:3331: śaśaś ca matsyeṣv api hi Yj_1.177c
GSD36yajn2piu:3336: śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai Yj_1.264c

GSD36yajn2piu:3339: śaṃ no devyā payaḥ kṣiptvā Yj_1.230c
GSD36yajn2piu:3385: śudhyeran strī ca śūdraś ca Yj_1.21c
GSD36yajn2piu:3407: śodhyasya mṛc ca toyaṃ ca Yj_3.32c

GSD36yajn2piu:3483: sa ātmā caiva yajñaś ca Yj_3.120a
GSD36yajn2piu:3501: sa gurur yaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā Yj_1.34a
GSD36yajn2piu:3516: sa tad dadyād viplavāc ca Yj_2.260c
GSD36yajn2piu:3566: sann asan sad asac ca yaḥ Yj_3.178d
GSD36yajn2piu:3691: sa hi somaṃ pibed dvijaḥ Yj_1.124b
GSD36yajn2piu:3716: saṃdhyāṃ prāk prātar evaṃ hi Yj_1.25a
GSD36yajn2piu:3728: saṃ mā siṃcantv anena tu Yj_3.282b
GSD36yajn2piu:3745: sākṣiṇaś ca ta eva hi Yj_2.202b
GSD36yajn2piu:3751: sākṣimac ca bhaved yad vā Yj_2.94c
GSD36yajn2piu:3764: sā brūte yaṃ sa dharmaḥ syād Yj_1.9c
GSD36yajn2piu:3939: svargaṃ hy apatyam ojaś ca Yj_1.265a
GSD36yajn2piu:4016: hīnā na syād vinā bhartrā Yj_1.86c
GSD36yajn2piu:4019: hīnāṃ strīṃ gāṃ ca madhyamam Yj_2.289d
GSD36yajn2piu:4027: hṛtam apy uddharet tu yaḥ Yj_2.119b
GSD36yajn2piu:4043: hrīḥ śaucaṃ dhīr dhṛtir damaḥ Yj_3.66b
